get.description: A price band is simply a price list. They're used to offer different prices to different customers. Product prices are set in the each price band. The price a customer receives for a product depends on the price band their account is linked to.

200.description: The details of the price bands have been successfully returned.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

get.description:
Price band types are used to to determine the type of price band within the application. Price bands can be 'Universal' or 'Limited'.

The API endpoint returns details of the price band types that can be used.

200.description: The details of the price band types have been successfully returned.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

get.description:
This returns the selling prices of your products. A price is returned for each price band associated with a product.

A price band is simply a price list. The price a customer receives for a product depends on the price band their account is linked to. The 'Standard' price band is the default.

The prices returned here do not include any customer specific discounts. The default sort (orderby) field is by 'product_code' ascending.

200.description: The details of the product price view have been successfully returned.

400.description: There was a problem with the request. Request body will include details.

x-sage-changelog.title: Extended operation
x-sage-changelog.description: The default sort (orderby) field is by 'product_code' ascending.

x-sage-changelog.title: Extended operation
x-sage-changelog.description: The 'date_time_updated' field has been added to this operation.

is_standard_band.description: Is this the Standard price band.

price_band_type_id.description: Price band type record Id; this will be 0 for Universal price bands and 1 for Limited price bands.

is_time_based.description: Is this price band time based.

active_date_time_from.description: The date and time this price band is active from.

active_date_time_to.description: The date and time this price band is active to.

date_time_created.description: The date and time this entity was created (UTC).

date_time_updated.description: The date and time this entity was last updated (UTC).

price_band.description: A price band is simply a price list. They're used to offer different prices to different customers. Product prices are set in the each price band. The price a customer receives for a product depends on the price band their account is linked to.

is_to_delete.description: When updating an existing customer, whether to delete this price band from the collection of customer price bands.

date_time_created.description: The date and time this entity was created (UTC).

date_time_updated.description: The date and time this entity was last updated (UTC).

customer_price_band.description: Customer price band show which customers are linked to which price bands, one customer can have multiple limited price bands, and one price band can be linked to many customers.

price_band_type.description:
Price band types are used to to determine the type of price band within the application. Price bands can be 'Universal' or 'Limited'.

The API endpoint returns details of the price band types that can be used.

date_time_created.description: The date and time this entity was created (UTC).

date_time_updated.description: The date and time this entity was last updated (UTC).

customer_discount_group.description: Customer discount groups allow you to enter a discount for groups of customers rather than individually.

date_time_created.description: The date and time this entity was created (UTC).

date_time_updated.description: The date and time this entity was last updated (UTC).

order_value_discount.description: Order value discounts are based on the total value of an invoice or sales order.

discount_or_surcharge_type.description: This specifies whether a percentage is applied as a discount or surcharge.

flat_rate_or_quantity_break_type.description: This specifies whether a discount is flat rate or calculated based on a quantity.

source_of_price_type.description: This specifies whether a discount originates from a Customer, Stock Item or Product Group discount.

pricing_type.description: This specifies how a price has been calculated. This can be from a Unit Price, Unit Discount Value, Unit Discount Percentage or Special Price.

product_stock_unit_name.description: The name of the unit the product is sold in. For example box, crate, bottle. The default unit is each.

price_band_name.description: The name of the price band.

product_price_use_standard.description:
'True' if uses the price from the standard price band is used otherwise 'False'

The price of a product can be linked to the price set in the standard price band. This is used when only some product prices are different to the standard price.

product_price_price.description: The selling price for the shown product and price band.

currency_name.description: The name of the currency used for the price.

currency_symbol.description: The symbol of the currency used for the price.

date_time_updated.description: The date and time this entity was last updated (UTC).

product_price_view.description:
This returns the selling prices of your products. A price is returned for each price band associated with a product.

A price band is simply a price list. The price a customer receives for a product depends on the price band their account is linked to. The 'Standard' price band is the default.

The prices returned here do not include any customer specific discounts. The default sort (orderby) field is by 'product_code' ascending.

use_limited_price_bands.description: Whether to use limited price bands.

use_customer_discount_groups.description: Whether to use customer discount groups.

use_stock_item_discounts.description: Whether to use stock item discounts.

use_product_group_discounts.description: Whether to use product group discounts.

use_quantity_based_discounts.description: Whether to use quantity based discounts.

use_order_value_discounts.description: Whether to use order value discounts.

date_time_created.description: The date and time this entity was created (UTC).

date_time_updated.description: The date and time this entity was last updated (UTC).

price_book_settings.description:
The Price Book settings are used to configure application behaviour with respect to the Price Book module.

Settings include the pricing discounts.
